articles.title: What I learned from 3 years of running Windows 11 on “unsupported” PCs - Ars Technica

articles.title: Eisai, Eli Lilly didn’t disclose heightened brain injury risk to Alzheimer’s trial patients: NYT - Fierce Biotech
articles.description: A new bombshell has been dropped in the scandal-plagued world of Alzheimer’s disease drug development. | Between the two companies, more than 560 people joined trials without being told they had a heightened risk of dangerous side effects such as brain bleedi…
